text: Anthony Conrad Nesty (born November 25, 1967) was a competition swimmer from Suriname. He won an Olympic gold medal in the 100-metre butterfly event in 1988. Nesty won a bronze medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He also competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics. He is currently an associate head coach at the University of Florida. == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:1984 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:Surinamese sportspeople Category:Swimmers
title: Anthony Nesty
